thread.title: Fabbri gets tiebreaker in 3rd as Blues beat Oilers, McDavid
thread.title_full: Fabbri gets tiebreaker in 3rd as Blues beat Oilers, McDavid

title: Fabbri gets tiebreaker in 3rd as Blues beat Oilers, McDavid
text:
> Top News Fabbri gets tiebreaker in 3rd as Blues beat Oilers, McDavid St. Louis Blues' Vladimir Tarasenko, of Russia, celebrates after scoring as Edmonton Oilers' Benoit Pouliot (67) skates past during the second period of an NHL hockey game Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in St. Louis. (AP Photo/Jeff Roberson) Search Help
